DeFi Queens meet your Goddess

Mint you Queen and subjugate those TradFi simps! Make them worship your DeFi Goddess!

Hunt for suits to turn them into simps (PVE) or battle other Queens (PVP) to see who can gather most Total Simps Locked (TSL)! Mint your own Queen and enter our play-to-earn metaverse!

Mint Now!

Overview

Simp NFTs

  • Every original minter of a Queen gets airdropped 1 suit NFT
  • Choose to turn him to warrior or slave simp
  • Use your slave simps for PVE or warrior simps for PVP

DFQ Tokenomics

  • Stacking your DeFi Queens will earn you DFQ tockens, boost your staking by adding simp slaves DFQ tockens an can be used to upgrade your Queens seductions capabilities(PVE), or improve battle abilities(PVE), improve simps, craft items or change traits and more

Charity & Community

  • 10% of all proceeds which includes 10% of mint and future royalties and sales will be donated to charity
  • Direct hands on involvement and donation to those in need
  • Constant follow up and updates on donations given

Game

  • 10% of all proceeds which includes 10% of mint and future royalties and sales will be donated to charity
  • Direct hands on involvement and donation to those in need
  • Constant follow up and updates on donations given

DeFi

  • 10% of all proceeds which includes 10% of mint and future royalties and sales will be donated to charity
  • Direct hands on involvement and donation to those in need
  • Constant follow up and updates on donations given

Unique generative Queens

Own a DeFi Queen and join an exclusive club with 9999 unique generative Queens. These beauties are all hand drawn and have over 250 unique attributes that come together to make each Queen truly stunning.
Original Minters of each Queen will get 1 free roaming suit airdropped to them, this suit can be turned into warrior simp for PVP or slave simp for PVE.

FAQs

How many Defi Queens will there be?

TEach DeFi Queen is hand drawn with unique elements, these elements are then separated and procedurally mixed to generate 9,999 unique Queens. There are 250 unique traits.

How are DeFi Queens Generated?

TEach DeFi Queen is hand drawn with unique elements, these elements are then separated and procedurally mixed to generate 9,999 unique Queens. There are 250 unique traits.

TEach DeFi Queen is hand drawn with unique elements, these elements are then separated and procedurally mixed to generate 9,999 unique Queens. There are 250 unique traits.

Litepaper

Introduction

DeFi Queens is an NFT metaverse game built on the Solana blockchain, it will combine elements of play-to-earn and DeFi. We believe that gaming is the future of entertainment and it has proven to be so over the years while blcokchain gaming is the future of all gaming ecosystem. Currently gaming industry is 200 billion and is perfectly set for disruption.

DeFi Queens is an NFT metaverse game built on the Solana blockchain, it will combine elements of play-to-earn and DeFi. We believe that gaming is the future of entertainment and it has proven to be so over the years while blcokchain gaming is the future of all gaming ecosystem. Currently gaming industry is 200 billion and is perfectly set for disruption. In addition to gaming blockchain technologies are poised to disrupt traditional finances and this allows for creation of unique products gamified finance set in metaverse. Simplifying many complex financial and DeFi concepts and introducing them though game making them accessible to larger audience will be the future. We can see that this novelty has a strong attraction to gaming community and younger generation and this will be a true disruption to financial and gaming industries changing and revolutionizing both industries. What was once unthinkable is now possible merging games and personal finances, we are truly on the edge of a new world. In DeFi Queens, players will be able to collect Suits by hunting and seducing them and later converting to slave simps(NFT’s) for PVE or warrior simps(NFT’s) PVP tasks. In PVE environment players will be able complete quests with slave simps to earn DFQ(i.e. stacking mechanism) and generate extra yield depending on there Total Simps Locked value. While in PVP games players will be able to lead there warrior simps to battle with other Queens and raid there lands for loot and resources. By playing the game, players will automatically participate in our player based economy by collecting tokens as rewards for completing tasks, winning battles, and progressing in there quests and missions. Players will also be able to spend there DFQ to upgrade there Queens and simps improving there PVE or PVP capabilities as well as crafting new items, upgrading characters and acquiring new traits. Main cryptocurrency behind DeFi Queens will be $DFQ. This will be main game coin used for both governance and as an in game reward token. Players will often have a choice how to use there Queens whether they want to acquire more $DFQ or collect additional simps to fawn to there Queens. We plan to incorporate original concepts of DeFi such as liquidity mining and bonding in game to produce protocol owned liquidity this will allow the game to pay out highly competitive $DFQ rewards to gamers and insure healthy tokenomics for a lasting project. By not being greedy and diverting most of the raised liquidity back to games ecosystem we will create a fair ecosystem for gamers around the world. We believe players should own their own assets and have full custody over what happens to them. We believe that players should be able to participate in an open marketplace whereby any value they contribute to the ecosystem should be rewarded just like any real world economy.

Concept/ Original Idea

DeFi Queens is an NFT metaverse game built on the Solana blockchain, it will combine elements of play-to-earn and DeFi. We believe that gaming is the future of entertainment and it has proven to be so over the years while blcokchain gaming is the future of all gaming ecosystem. Currently gaming industry is 200 billion and is perfectly set for disruption.

“DeFi will eat TradFi” is a common knowledge and a catch phrase in cryptoverse and we fully support it we think that she will suck out all the liquidity from TradFi. As we can see managers from traditional finance field are becoming aware of decentralized finance and know that it is the future of finance. However they have become so solidified in their ways that they ar unable to master DeFi and all they can do is simp for it wishing they could have her. DeFi takes advantage of all these simps and will make them her slaves one by one subjugating them and sucking away all the liquidity from TradFi into Defi. This game to commemorate the rise of Queen DeFi that will subjugate all the suits and turn them into simps - overtaking the TradFi world and bring financial services and freedom to all the people of this world, offering fair and beneficial services to all of humanity.
